com.stripe.android.util

Class StripeTextUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stripe.android.util.StripeTextUtils

  • public class StripeTextUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for common text-related operations on Stripe data coming from the server.

      • hasAnyPrefix

        public static boolean hasAnyPrefix(java.lang.String number,
                                   java.lang.String... prefixes)
        Check to see if the input number has any of the given prefixes.
        Parameters:
        number - the number to test
        prefixes - the prefixes to test against
        Returns:
        true if number begins with any of the input prefixes

      • isWholePositiveNumber

        public static boolean isWholePositiveNumber(java.lang.String value)
        Check to see whether the input string is a whole, positive number.
        Parameters:
        value - the input string to test
        Returns:
        true if the input value consists entirely of integers

      • nullIfBlank

        public static java.lang.String nullIfBlank(java.lang.String value)
        Swap null for blank text values.
        Parameters:
        value - an input string that may or may not be entirely whitespace
        Returns:
        null if the string is entirely whitespace, or the original value if not

      • isBlank

        public static boolean isBlank(java.lang.String value)
        A checker for whether or not the input value is entirely whitespace. This is slightly more aggressive than TextUtils#isEmpty(CharSequence), which only returns true for null or "".
        Parameters:
        value - a possibly blank input string value
        Returns:
        true if and only if the value is all whitespace, null, or empty

      • asCardType

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String asCardType(@Nullable
                                                    java.lang.String possibleCardType)
        Converts an unchecked String value to a Card.CardBrand or null.
        Parameters:
        possibleCardType - a String that might match a Card.CardBrand or be empty.
        Returns:
        null if the input is blank, else the appropriate Card.CardBrand.

      • asFundingType

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String asFundingType(@Nullable
                                                       java.lang.String possibleFundingType)
        Converts an unchecked String value to a Card.FundingType or null.
        Parameters:
        possibleFundingType - a String that might match a Card.FundingType or be empty
        Returns:
        null if the input is blank, else the appropriate Card.FundingType
